articles.author: Venkata Krishna B
articles.title: World Cup chances slim if KL Rahul, Shreyas Iyer don’t make it to Asia Cup - The Indian Express
articles.description: Crucial to determine the No 4 spot, Rahul is lined up to play a couple of practice matches and might undergo a fitness test on August 18, following which the selectors and team management will take a final call for his inclusion for Asia Cup.
articles.content: With only 54 days left for the World Cup and India beginning to sweat over their squad combination, it is understood that in case KL Rahul and Shreyas Iyer dont make it to the Asia Cup, their chances… [+4727 chars]
